blogs.title: Evidence of the square root of Brownian motion
blogs.summary: A mathematical proof of existence of a stochastic process involving fractional exponents seemed out of question after some mathematicians claimed this cannot exist. This observation is strongly linked to the current definition and may undergo revision if
